alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 12:26PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Coconino Counties through 1245 PM MST... At 1226 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mead Ranch, or 10 miles northeast of Payson. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Payson, Star Valley, Flowing Springs, Mesa Del Caballo, Tonto Village, Geronimo Estates, Freedom Acres, Kohls Ranch, Whispering Pines, Mead Ranch, Bear Flat, Upper Tonto Creek Campground, Ponderosa Campground, Water Wheel Burn At Houston Mesa Rd- S, Beaver Valley and Water Wheel Burn At Houston Mesa Rd-N. This includes State Route 260 between mile markers 255 and 271. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
